name: vectorcam
description: Record gifs out of <svg> elements painlessly

scripts.build: browserify -dvo dist/vectorcam.js -s vectorcam vectorcam.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/vectorcam.min.js dist/vectorcam.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build ; git add . ; git commit -am 'autogenerated build commit' ; git push ; npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} ; npm publish

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
